overview: A moderator has brought together Melody Marks, Maya Kendrick, Morgan Rain, and Adria Rae into a focus group and introduces them to Adult Time. As the girls watch various clips that the moderator brings up, they gradually become more aroused, excited about the offerings. In fact, they become so aroused that it isn't long before the girls focus on each other instead of the screen or the moderator!
title: Focus Group Frenzy
